document_data.name: Ravenshade
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ravenshade''' family was a [[Baldurian]] [[patriar]] family that dealt in the [[gem]] and [[jewelry]] trade, as well as the [[dye]] and [[ink]] trade.
document_data.Description: The Ravenshade family were trade specialists. They lived in a residence that was located in the central-west area of [[Manorborn]].
document_data.Notable Ravenshades:
*[[Archibald Ravenshade]], a [[half-elven]] playwright from Baldur's Gate in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
*[[Myer Ravenshade]], a [[dwarf]] and a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
document_data.History: In [[1482 DR]], a young adolescent of the Ravenshade family, along with other noble youths, severed the hand of the [[Beloved Ranger]]. The young Ravenshade member dropped a [[brooch]] from their [[cloak]], pointing them to the crime. They hid away in [[Horgold Hadru]]'s cellar, as Hadru owed one of the patriar families a favor.
